Class UserDatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserDatabaseManager
  • public class UserDatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserDatabaseManager class manages user data stored in a JSON file. It provides functionality to interact with user information such as retrieval, backup, and other operations.

      • persistDataForBackUp

        public boolean persistDataForBackUp()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Persists the current state of user data for backup purposes.
        Returns:
        true if the backup operation is successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs while persisting data for backup.

      • removeOriginalStoredDataFile

        public void removeOriginalStoredDataFile()
        Removes the original stored data file from the system. This operation is typically performed after a successful backup to avoid redundancy.

      • removeOBackUpStoredDataFile

        public void removeOBackUpStoredDataFile()
        Removes the backup stored data file from the system. This operation is typically performed after ensuring the integrity of the backup.

      • restoreDataToOriginalFile

        public void restoreDataToOriginalFile()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Restores the backed-up data to the original stored data file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs during the data restoration process.
